name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary: Senior Software Engineer with 13+ years of experience in developing high-performance applications, specializing in **Python**, **JavaScript**, and **Django**. Adept in building and integrating **APIs**, with strong skills in localization techniques such as **Moz-l10n**, **i18n**, and **l10n**. Proficient in both frontend and backend development, leveraging technologies like **React**, **Next.js**, and **Node.js**. Demonstrated expertise in delivering compliance-driven solutions, ensuring alignment with industry standards. Skilled in utilizing **Rust** and **C++** for performance-critical applications. Exceptional communication abilities enhance cross-functional collaboration and project success, while a solid understanding of open-source principles drives innovative software solutions.

experience.responsibilities:
- Developed robust back-end solutions using **Python** and **Django**, implementing secure **APIs** to ensure efficient data handling and service integration.
- Enhanced application scalability and performance through effective use of **JavaScript**, integrating localization strategies like **Moz-l10n**, **i18n**, and **l10n** for a diverse user base.
- Led multiple projects by utilizing **Rust** and **C++** for performance-critical components, achieving an up to **30%** increase in processing efficiency.
- Collaborated with cross-functional teams to define clear communication protocols, ensuring alignment and influencing project success in both technical and non-technical domains.
- Spearheaded the adoption of **APIs** for external integrations, supporting data exchange across platforms with **99.9%** uptime.
- Optimized application workflows and performance, resulting in **75%** faster response times compared to legacy systems.
- Ensured clean code practices and maintained high code quality through regular peer reviews and the integration of modern development tools, decreasing bugs by **20%** over deployments.
- Managed version control effectively using systems like Git, maintaining detailed change logs and release notes for future reference.
- Participated in design reviews and sprint retrospectives, fostering an environment of continuous improvement and knowledge sharing within the team.

• Developed scalable applications using **Python** (Django) and **JavaScript** frameworks (React 18, Vue 3, Next.js) to enhance business functionality and user experience.
• Implemented APIs for integration with internal and third-party services, ensuring seamless communication and data exchange.
• Leveraged skills in localization and internationalization (Moz-l10n, i18n, l10n) to create user-friendly applications that cater to diverse audiences.
• Enhanced performance of high-volume transactional systems by migrating to microservices architecture leveraging **Node.js** (NestJS/Express) and **Python** (FastAPI, Django).
• Developed interactive front-end applications that deliver responsive interfaces for financial tools and admin panels, incorporating **TypeScript** and **Redux Toolkit** for state management.
• Delivered real-time analytics dashboards utilizing **D3.js** and **Power BI Embedded**, enabling operations teams to access immediate insights into transactions and anomalies.
• Designed and deployed an event-driven architecture with **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus** for improved asynchronous communication across workflows with an uptime of **99.9%**.
• Created robust ETL pipelines with **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Data Factory** supporting batch and real-time processing for financial data from various sources.
• Built and deployed machine learning models for fraud detection using **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure ML**, improving detection accuracy by **30%** based on historical user behavior.
• Integrated ML pipelines for real-time credit scoring and transaction classification using **MLflow** and **Airflow**, reducing processing time by **25%**.

• Developed and optimized **backend services** utilizing **Python** with frameworks like **Django** for a global e-commerce platform, achieving **99.9%** uptime and minimal latency.
• Collaborated on cross-functional teams to create high-performance APIs, integrating **JavaScript** technologies to enhance user accessibility and promote localization through **Moz-l10n**, **i18n**, and **l10n** strategies.
• Architected real-time features leveraging **WebSockets** and event-driven design with tools like **Kafka** and **RabbitMQ**, resulting in a **30%** improvement in response times for order updates and customer support.
• Designed scalable frontend solutions using **React (18)**, **Vue 3**, and **Angular**, with enhancements from **TypeScript**, **Redux Toolkit**, and **Tailwind CSS** to ensure responsive user interfaces on both web and mobile devices.
• Managed distributed data storage with **MongoDB**, **PostgreSQL**, **Redis**, and **Cassandra**, delivering rapid data access in a high-traffic e-commerce environment and achieving up to a **50%** reduction in load times through effective caching.
• Integrated advanced AI/ML recommendation systems with **scikit-learn**, **LightGBM**, and **TensorFlow**, which boosted conversion rates by **15%** through personalized customer engagement strategies.
• Employed Redis for caching frequently accessed information like product metadata and shopping cart sessions, significantly enhancing application performance by reducing read load.
• Executed feature flags and blue-green deployments utilizing **LaunchDarkly** and **Kubernetes**, facilitating **A/B testing** and minimizing rollout risks for major platform updates.
• Created mobile-friendly, **SEO-optimized** e-commerce interfaces using **Next.js**, **Vue 3 + Nuxt**, and **HTML5/CSS3**, compliant with **WCAG 2.1** accessibility standards.
• Developed secure payment processes using **Stripe**, **PayPal**, and **Razorpay**, ensuring PCI compliance and protecting sensitive data through tokenized transactions.
• Implemented robust role-based access control (RBAC) and **OAuth 2.0** to secure access for customers and admins, ensuring compliance with **GDPR** and safeguarding user data.
